capabilities and in particular remote server management at scale ok so we when
we started down this path we talked a lot of customers and wanted to hear what some of their challenges were with
managing servers and particular around configuration management and what we
heard was that while most of our customers are very heavily invested in
template izing and desired state based sort of deployment or all that great
stuff that they still needed some kind of capability to implement configuration
changes on servers on an ad hoc basis and they wanted to do so in a way that
was secure that was reliable in terms of making sure that the changes are rolled
out in a very consistent manner that they're not at the same time opening up
let's say our DP or SSH access to all their servers and really sort of
creating this larger sort of blast radius if you will for implementing change and if they needed some way to
control who was doing what and where and and finally also having visibility into
what was actually being done so with all
that sort of feedback we implemented run command which is a remote administration
tool it allows you to run actions on your instances remotely these actions
can be from a set of building block actions that we've built in we'll take a look at that list in a second or it can
be quite simply any powershell script that you that you write as well all this capability is
available from the ec2 API CLI console so we wanted to make it as simple to use
as possible as well and very simply you can delegate complete control or access
through IM policies as well so we wanted to make sure it was secure controlled
and then also very consistent and easy to use with all the visibility that you
need into what's going on so from the centralized place you can see the status of every sort of interaction for rolling
out these actions across fleets of servers so let's take a quick look at
what are some of the actions that we have built into into the product so install imma size real simply make it
really easy to remotely install and configure or bootstrap software configuring windows update the ability
to very easily deploy PowerShell modules joining instances two domains and also
configuring the cloud watch logs agent and then finally for anything that's not
in that list as I said you have the ability to roll your own with just
writing PowerShell commands the nice thing is with all these you can then
actually go ahead and create your own custom actions which all get the same security benefits all the ease of use
all the other things that we kind of talked about the idea here is we want you to be able to sort of develop and

and well tested units of activity and then be able to apply the same
permissions and track and use those actions very reliably and predictably so
here's just a you know small set of ideas of of things that we've heard customers
want to be able to do with run command and you know whether it's installing and
bootstrapping instances with various third-party agents or other software
whether those agents are for things like backup or things of that nature or other
